entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rendering razor components outside of asp.net using HtmlRenderer ignores @layout directive #55068
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55067
  • Perf regression: fortunes #55066
  • Perf improvement: https #55065
  • HeadContent Append Mode #55064
  • Authentication for static files || OpenIDConnect || BlazoreServer App || Dotnetcore 8 #55057
  • Model binders cannot set a parameter to null if it has a non-null default value. #55056
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.4.24209.6] When launch the WorldExplorer homepage, it shows an error "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Security-Policy" #55054
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55053
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55052
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55051
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55050
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55049
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55048
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55047
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55046
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55045
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55044
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55043

Closed

  • Can't run Authentication Samples #53700
    Backlog
  • blazor.web.js suddenly broken 8.0.100 #55063
  • Blazor WASM .net 8: VS can not show variables in Locals or Immediate Window #55055
  • Notify Unhandled Circuit Exception #55027
  • Google OAuth Handler > Support full list of URI parameters #55058
  • Random NullReferenceException on HttpContext.User Kestrel/Outofprocess #54962

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the style for developer exception page #55042
    community-contribution, area-middleware

Merged

  • Add support for generating OpenAPI parameters #55041
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Updated

  • Reuse known keys in XmlKeyManager #54490
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI request bodies #55040
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Using SearchValues in ContentDispositionHeaderValue #55039
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24207.7 #55011
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
